dialogue.text: Hail Traveler! This is the humble town of Surthun
I'm Gwindol, the Mayor. You are welcome to stay if you'd like.

options.option: Hail, Gwindol. Could you tell me about this village?
Looks nice. I'd like to know more.
What a dump. You have some cleaning up to do.

dialogue.text: Sure, I'm glad you show interest.
But to be honest. There's not much going on at the moment.
The only thing worth mentioning are the outlaws tormenting our homes.

options.option: I'll kill the outlaws for you.
Sure sounds like a problem for you.
What does that have to do with me?

dialogue.text: Uhm, okay. Well, nothing is happening at the moment, but perhaps you could be of service with something? We'll pay you...

options.option: Tell me what the problem is.
Payment? I'm always up for some gold.
I changed my mind I don't care.

dialogue.text: But it is not our fault.
It's the outlaws! There base of operations is just out of town.

options.option: Tell you what. I'll help you out for the right amount of gold.

quest.text: Truly? You'll help us? You have our eternal gratitude.

options.option: No, You'll have to deal with it yourself.
